title: [BUG]A potential bug of unchecked return value to nULL pointer dereference
body:
In **file async.c,line 70**,Function **malloc** may fail to allocate memory and Function **memcpy** may copy data to null pointer as following graph shows.
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/87304478/128593231-ae8d2c6a-18ae-4cad-9768-0cf842c9fdb3.png)
Would you help to check whether this is a true bug? Thanks very much.
